titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Pyrithiobac Sodium.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/4/1997--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1998, the duty on sodium 2-chloro-6- ((4,6-dimethoxy pyrimidin-2-y1)thio) benzoate (pyrithiobac sodium).
